div.p: The Homepage

div.head: pubs.aip.org
div.p: Explore AIP Publishing and our portfolio by logging into your account profile. Access published articles, information about our partnerships, individual publications, and submit your next manuscript.

div.head: Searching the Platform
div.p: From the homepage you can conduct a basic, advanced, or citation search across our content platform.

div.head: Search Results
div.p: When search results appear, you can:
• Filter by format, topic, subject, or journal In the left-hand column, you can view the cover image, jump to a specific type of article, or view articles by topic.

div.head: Accessing an Article
div.p: Institutional customers access content via registered IP ranges. If you try to view content from an unauthorized IP address, you will be asked to select your method of access as shown here.
If you do not have access through your institution, you have the option to log in as an individual subscriber, purchase standard PPV, or view the article via Open Athens or Shibboleth.

div.head: Viewing an Article
div.p: IP authenticated users can access articles without creating a profile. However to benefit from all tools available we encourage users to create a profile.
From an article, users can:
• Save searches
• Sign up for RSS feeds
• View in a split screen
• Download an article as a PDF
• Sign up for journal alerts
• View author affiliations and ORCID, where provided
• View and download article citations
• Add to your "favorites"
• "Share" the article through social media and Reddit
• View article metrics

div.head: • Access related articles
div.p: Most articles are accessible as HTML or PDF.
If only one format is available, the navigation bar will be updated to reflect the version offered. If available, supplementary data will be displayed in the left navigation.

div.head: Article Icons
div.p: The blue circle icons next to certain article titles indicate if it is a:

A Scilight, a science highlight, is a professional summary of significant developments in a particular field of research. The articles that are chosen for Scilight are recommended by the research-active editors of AIP Publishing's journals.

div.head: Article Figures & Split Screen Option
div.p: Select "views" to toggle between "figures & tables" and "article contents". Article "figures & tables" can be downloaded directly as a PowerPoint presentation with citations or as a High-res image.
The newly added split screen feature offers readers a way to read an article and view the figures, references, and related content alongside each other.

div.head: Article Metrics & Citations
div.p: When available, article metrics can be viewed by selecting "View Metrics" in the upper right-corner of the page. As articles receive "views" and "citations" they will be calculated and updated daily.
(Note: article metrics are cumulative from 12/13/2016 onwards).

div.head: Sign In
div.p: Article citations can be viewed by selecting "Web of Science" or "Crossref"

div.head: Related Content
div.p: A list of related content is found to the right of the article under "Related Content".

div.head: Sharing an Article
div.p: Click on the share button to share an article via Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, or LinkedIn.

div.head: Sign In
